764620.name: Easy Red Demo
764620.description:
Welcome to the Operation Overlord. Prepare to land on all five Normandy sectors: Omaha, Juno, Sword, Utah and Gold. Fight on the sand, by the forests, parachute on the fields and conquer the hills: Welcome to Easy Red.

This game is Easy Red DEMO VERSION.
This version will not get updates and dosn't contains all game features.

In Easy Red you will fight on the most significant battles of the D-Day, from the sea landings to the capture of Caen. You will able to drive vehicles, use many weapons, manage your inventory, command your squad as team leader or take cure of it as a medic, refill magazines, parachute from the sky, and much more.

Buying Easy Red you will have access to all the future DLC. The first planned DLC is the multiplayer session. The others DLCs will be planned after the publishment of the full version and will integrate new maps and operations like Operation Anzio, or even some WW1 Campaigns.

A gameplay provided by JayPlays:


Game controls:
KEY->ACTION

WASD + Mouse-> Move/Rotate unit
F-> Take/Iteract/Dismount
R-> Reload Gun
Q/E-> Inclinate body over corner
G-> Trow granate
I-> Open Inventory
Mouse Wheel (On inventory)-> Move items between inventories/Drop item from inventory.
TAB-> Switch Gun
SHIFT (hold)-> RUN
Spacebar-> Jump/Brake vehicle
C-> Switch First/Third person view
P-> Pause Menu
Left-ALT-> Gun Up/Down
(+/-)-> Go fast forward/slow motion (development function)
